data.title: Detective Chinatown 2 = Tang ren jie tan an 2
data.meta_description: Lured to New York City by a wedding invitation, Qin finds himself teaming up with Tang to participate in a global detective contest offering a huge prize to whoever can locate the killer of the grandson of the godfather of Chinatown within one week.
data.text: On August 28, between 8 a.m. and 12 p.m., the Library catalog will be offline for about one hour. You will still be able to search, but some functions like placing holds and renewing checkouts will be unavailable. We apologize for the inconvenience and will remove this message when the maintenance is complete.
